name: Nihilism
description:
#IndiE3Jam

Nothing Matters...Not!

Was thinking about selling this one, but ah what the hell. Although I may turn this into a full fledged game some day, who knows? I think the game is best played out of a browser, so bare with me and try it out.

Controls are simple, just use the mouse; you don't even have to click(aside from menu). ALSO 1024:768 is the best resolution for the game.

If you liked this game please: recommend it to friends, make videos, write reviews, because those things brighten up my day.
